price: Noa nkorͻfoͻ dii wͻn anim kan buu Y’akoa no ᴐtorofo. Wͻkaa sε: “Bͻdamfoͻ.“ Wͻkasa tiaa no, hunahunaa no, poo no.
arabic: ۞ كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ فَكَذَّبُواْ عَبۡدَنَا وَقَالُواْ مَجۡنُونٞ وَٱزۡدُجِرَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin fakadhabū ʿabdanā waqālū majnūnun wa-uz'dujira
